This market can be Bitcoin in exchange for a service, in exchange for work, in exchange for gifts, other currencies, metals, gold, etc.

Please my fellow fans friends and family I need your advice how to invest on bitcoin and cryptoYes is possible to work and be paid in Bitcoin but you can mostly do that working remotely especially in cryptocurrency related jobs. You can choose to pick a career in social media, community management or other careers in web development (web3, Defi etc) and get paid in Bitcoin or other cryptocurency that can be converted to Bitcoin. Most physical job hasn't started paying in Bitcoin so it'll be difficult to get a job although you could pay yourself in Bitcoin in the sense that immediately you received your salary in dollars or whatever fiats associated with your geographical location, you can immediately buy Bitcoin and store in your personal wallet.Bitcoin isn't centralized so it can be used Peer2Peer all over the world provided you have internet access over there. Getting yourself involved in the industry isn't hard to achieve but what matters most is if you can have the patience to wait and be in control of your emotions to avoid greed or Fud make a fool out of you. Stay active on the forum and you can get ideas on how to go about investing in Bitcoin. For now just keep saving up capital to make your first purchase.

Please my fellow fans friends and family I need your advice how to invest on bitcoin and crypto Some jurisdictions still prohibit Bitcoin. All of what you described about bitcoin is accurate. Many people profit from their investments in it, especially those who were fortunate enough to participate in its infancy. They testify and discuss how they generate money, but they never disclose the risks or losses involved. Bitcoin is the most secure cryptocurrency investment, but it also carries risk, so if you think you can invest and see a quick return, you're mistaken. comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: Just like all investments, make a business, start early, invest in the long term, and make your investment goal, which is to maximize income, and within a short period, you will find yourself reaching your goal.But without a job, the road will be difficult, so develop yourself and your skills, because in the end it is an investment like other investments.

comments.body: Quote from: hugeblack on February 25, 2023, 05:15:18 PMJust like all investments, make a business, start early, invest in the long term, and make your investment goal, which is to maximize income, and within a short period, you will find yourself reaching your goal.But without a job, the road will be difficult, so develop yourself and your skills, because in the end it is an investment like other investments.It is possible to start, grow and earn from a business in the bitcoin industry. But before you start it is important to make a business plan that will guide the business to achieve the general and specific objectives. Starting early could also mean that when we identify any cryptocurrency business opportunity we must maximize it immediately. Which means we must avoid procrastination and delay. The path to achieving the investment goal might not be easy but with determination and persistence, these goals can be achieved. Starting and running a business can be very challenging which is why it is good to have a job that can sustain you as you wait for your business to grow and become profitable so that you can depend on it to pay your bills. That is why it is important to develop yourself in some areas that can help you secure paid jobs
